name: houston-we-have-a-bug
description: A Chrome extension for quick bug capture with annotation and context.

scripts.build: esbuild src/popup.ts --bundle --outdir=dist --format=iife && sass src/styles:dist/styles && npm run copy-files
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently "esbuild src/popup.ts --bundle --outdir=dist --format=iife --watch" "sass --watch src/styles:dist/styles" "chokidar 'src/popup.html' 'manifest.json' 'src/images/**' -c 'npm run copy-files'"
scripts.copy-files: cp src/popup.html manifest.json dist/ && cp -r src/images dist/
